description: Try our easy to follow Thai Red Curry Paste recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Red curry,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Red Curry Paste Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp lime, zest grated (and 1 tbs lime juice)
1 tsp chilli flakes, crushed, soaked in 1 tsp hot water for 5 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in the bowl of a small food processor and process for 2-3 minutes, scraping down the side of the bowl occasionally, until a finely chopped paste forms.
